message.heading: No, get out of town. My mom thinks I'm going camping with the guys. Look, Jennifer, my mother would freak out if she knew I was going out with you, and I'd get the standard lecture about how she never did that kind of stuff when she was a kid. I mean, look, I think the woman was born a nun.
message.body: Explicabo et beatae. Sint distinctio dignissimos nulla nemo nihil accusantium porro. Consectetur corporis excepturi aperiam atque at voluptates quasi. Possimus voluptatem repudiandae. Ab dolore tenetur. Voluptatum odio labore nemo dignissimos quos consequatur. Laboriosam eveniet soluta.

message.heading: I had a horrible nightmare. I dreamed that I went... back in time. It was terrible.
